attributes.action: Consider a Brandon relief road after A11 dualling
attributes.additional_details:
Plans are being drawn up to build a relief road (along with several new homes) in Brandon in Suffolk.

We feel that the dualling of the A11 nearby will reduce the amount of traffic that travels through the town and could reduce the need for such a relief road.

It is our belief that the relief road should be considered only once the work on the A11 has been completed and the traffic through the town is measured again.

We urge the government to speak to Suffolk County Council and discourage them from spending millions on a road that may not be needed.
